alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 4:22PM PST until December 18 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet possible. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Snohomish and King Counties, including Darrington, Index, Skykomish, Stevens Pass, and Snoqualmie Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Monday night through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
